languages.text: {n}Глаза Джай тускнеют.{/n} "Как жаль... как жаль. Что ж, тогда благодарю вас за то, что выслушали скорбную историю несчастной женщины. Если же вы вдруг передумаете, то я буду где-то неподалеку... да, скорее всего, прямо на этом самом месте". {n}Джай откланивается и поворачивается к стойке.{/n} "Эй, Октавиана! Тащи еще одну бутылку!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаза Джай тускнеют.{/n} "Как жаль... как жаль. Что ж, тогда благодарю вас за то, что выслушали скорбную историю несчастной женщины. Если же вы вдруг передумаете, то я буду где-то неподалеку... да, скорее всего, прямо на этом самом месте". {n}Джай откланивается и поворачивается к стойке.{/n} "Эй, Октавиана! Тащи еще одну бутылку!"

languages.text: {n}Jae's eyes lose some of their lustre.{/n} "That's too bad... too bad. Well, in that case, thank you for listening to the tragic tale of a lady down on her luck. If you happen to change your mind, I'll be around here somewhere... actually, probably right here." {n}Jae bids you goodbye and turns to the bar.{/n} "Hey, Octaviana! Get me another bottle!"

Тащи еще одну бутылку!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae's eyes lose some of the luster.{/n} "That's too bad... too bad. Well, in that case, thank you for listening to the tragic tale of a doleful lady. If you happen to change your mind, I'll be around here somewhere... actually, probably right here." {n}Jae bids you goodbye and turns to the bar.{/n} "Hey, Octaviana! Get me another bottle!"

If you happen to change your mind, I'll be around here somewhere... actually, probably right here." {n}Jae bids you goodbye and turns to the bar.{/n} "Hey, Octaviana! Get me another bottle!"

languages.text: {n}ジェイの目が輝きをわずかに失った。{/n}「そう、それは…残念。とにかく、運に見放された女の悲劇話を聞いてくれて感謝するよ。もし気が変わったら、このあたりにいると思う…いえ、確実にここにいるから」{n}ジェイは別れを告げ、バーの方へ振り返った。{/n}「ねえ、オクタヴィアナ！もう1本ちょうだい！」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes lose some of their lustre.{/n} "That's too bad... too bad. Well, in that case, thank you for listening to the tragic tale of a lady down on her luck. If you happen to change your mind, I'll be around here somewhere... actually, probably right here." {n}Jae bids you goodbye and turns to the bar.{/n} "Hey, Octaviana! Get me another bottle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイの目が輝きをわずかに失った。{/n}「そう、それは…残念。とにかく、運に見放された女の悲劇話を聞いてくれて感謝するよ。もし気が変わったら、このあたりにいると思う…いえ、確実にここにいるから」{n}ジェイは別れを告げ、バーの方へ振り返った。{/n}「ねえ、オクタヴィアナ！もう1本ちょうだい！」

languages.text: {n}婕伊的眼神失去了些许光彩。{/n}“那真是太……太糟糕了。话虽如此，还是要感谢你愿意聆听这位倒霉女士的倒霉故事。要是你改变了主意，我会一直待在这附近……嗯，我应该就待在这个酒吧里，哪里也不去。”{n}婕伊摆了摆手，表示告别，然后又转向吧台。{/n}“嘿，奥克塔维娜！再给我来一瓶！”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes lose some of their lustre.{/n} "That's too bad... too bad. Well, in that case, thank you for listening to the tragic tale of a lady down on her luck. If you happen to change your mind, I'll be around here somewhere... actually, probably right here." {n}Jae bids you goodbye and turns to the bar.{/n} "Hey, Octaviana! Get me another bottle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊的眼神失去了些许光彩。{/n}“那真是太……太糟糕了。话虽如此，还是要感谢你愿意聆听这位倒霉女士的倒霉故事。要是你改变了主意，我会一直待在这附近……嗯，我应该就待在这个酒吧里，哪里也不去。”{n}婕伊摆了摆手，表示告别，然后又转向吧台。{/n}“嘿，奥克塔维娜！再给我来一瓶！”

languages.text: {n}Le regard de Jae perd quelque peu de son éclat.{/n} « Eh bien, c'est dommage... Oui, vraiment dommage. Dans ce cas, je vous remercie d'avoir pris le temps d'écouter le récit tragique d'une dame frappée par la malchance. Si vous changez d'avis, vous me trouverez dans les parages... probablement ici même, quand j'y pense. {n}Jae vous fait ses adieux et se tourne vers le bar.{/n} Hé, Octaviana ! Une autre bouteille ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes lose some of their lustre.{/n} "That's too bad... too bad. Well, in that case, thank you for listening to the tragic tale of a lady down on her luck. If you happen to change your mind, I'll be around here somewhere... actually, probably right here." {n}Jae bids you goodbye and turns to the bar.{/n} "Hey, Octaviana! Get me another bottle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard de Jae perd quelque peu de son éclat.{/n} « Eh bien, c'est dommage... Oui, vraiment dommage. Dans ce cas, je vous remercie d'avoir pris le temps d'écouter le récit tragique d'une dame frappée par la malchance. Si vous changez d'avis, vous me trouverez dans les parages... probablement ici même, quand j'y pense. {n}Jae vous fait ses adieux et se tourne vers le bar.{/n} Hé, Octaviana ! Une autre bouteille ! »

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Jae pierden parte de su lustre.{/n} «Una pena... una pena. Bueno, en ese caso, gracias por escuchar la trágica historia de una dama desafortunada. Si por casualidad cambias de parecer, estaré por aquí en alguna parte... a ver, seguramente sea aquí». {n}Jae se despide de ti y se gira hacia la barra.{/n} «¡Oye, Octaviana! ¡Trae otra botella!».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes lose some of their lustre.{/n} "That's too bad... too bad. Well, in that case, thank you for listening to the tragic tale of a lady down on her luck. If you happen to change your mind, I'll be around here somewhere... actually, probably right here." {n}Jae bids you goodbye and turns to the bar.{/n} "Hey, Octaviana! Get me another bottle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Jae pierden parte de su lustre.{/n} «Una pena... una pena. Bueno, en ese caso, gracias por escuchar la trágica historia de una dama desafortunada. Si por casualidad cambias de parecer, estaré por aquí en alguna parte... a ver, seguramente sea aquí». {n}Jae se despide de ti y se gira hacia la barra.{/n} «¡Oye, Octaviana! ¡Trae otra botella!».

languages.text: {n}Jaes Augen verlieren einen Teil ihres Glanzes.{/n} "Das ist schade ... sehr schade. Aber gut, wenn das so ist, danke, dass Ihr Euch die tragische Geschichte einer vom Glück verlassenen Frau angehört habt. Solltet Ihr es Euch anders überlegen, bin ich irgendwo in der Gegend ... na ja, vermutlich genau hier." {n}Jae verabschiedet sich von dir und wendet sich der Bar zu.{/n} "Hey, Octaviana! Gib mir noch 'ne Flasche!"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes lose some of their lustre.{/n} "That's too bad... too bad. Well, in that case, thank you for listening to the tragic tale of a lady down on her luck. If you happen to change your mind, I'll be around here somewhere... actually, probably right here." {n}Jae bids you goodbye and turns to the bar.{/n} "Hey, Octaviana! Get me another bottle!"

If you happen to change your mind, I'll be around here somewhere... actually, probably right here." {n}Jae bids you goodbye and turns to the bar.{/n} "Hey, Octaviana! Get me another bottle!"

languages.text: {n}Jae'ın gözlerindeki parıltı kısmen sönüyor.{/n} "Tüh... Hem de ne tüh. O hâlde bahtsız bir kadının trajik öyküsünü dinlediğin için teşekkür ederim. Olur da fikrin değişirse beni buralarda bulabilirsin... Hatta muhtemelen tam da burada olurum." {n}Jae, sana veda edip bara doğru dönüyor.{/n} "Octaviana! Bana bir şişe daha ver!"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes lose some of their lustre.{/n} "That's too bad... too bad. Well, in that case, thank you for listening to the tragic tale of a lady down on her luck. If you happen to change your mind, I'll be around here somewhere... actually, probably right here." {n}Jae bids you goodbye and turns to the bar.{/n} "Hey, Octaviana! Get me another bottle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'ın gözlerindeki parıltı kısmen sönüyor.{/n} "Tüh... Hem de ne tüh. Neyse, olsun, yine de kara talihli bir kadının trajik yaşam hikâyesini dinlediğin için teşekkür ederim. Olur da fikrin değişirse beni buralarda bulabilirsin... Hatta muhtemelen tam da burada olurum." {n}Jae, sana elveda edip bara doğru dönüyor.{/n} "Octaviana! Bana bir şişe daha ver!"
